item.description:
The Capitol Cinema Collective is sponsoring a benefit for the 3rd Annual Hartford International Film Festival (HIFF3). It is 7:00 pm to 8:30 pm. Come help promote HIFF3. The festival takes place Nov. 6-9, 2008. You can visit our website: http://www.hiffct.org... to learn more or email tara.parrish@hiffct.org.

The benefit will include trailers from the upcoming films.

There is a suggested donation of $25.00 but we won't turn anyone away. Come help celebrate independent films in Hartford.
item.how_to_find_us: I still look like my picture.

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: Benefit for the 3rd Annual Hartford Internaltional Film Festival
